properties.name: user.service.url
properties.description: User service url to be used for fetching user details

properties.name: school.service.url
properties.description: School service url to be used for fetching school details

properties.name: notification.service.url
properties.description: Notification service url to be used for send notifications

properties.name: fallback.url.reset.password
properties.description: Fallback url to be used for reset password

properties.name: jwt.iss
properties.description: Issuer to be used for generating JWT

properties.name: jwt.aud
properties.description: Audience to be used for generating JWT

properties.name: aws.ses.sender
properties.description: Sender email address for AWS SES

properties.name: max.login.attempts
properties.description: Number of login attempts allowed before locking the account

properties.name: skip.authorization.urls
properties.description: List of URLs to skip authorization

properties.name: skip.authorization.paths
properties.description: List of paths to skip authorization
